meanings.definition: The practice or study of robots.
meanings.sent1: In robotries, scientists learn about how robots work.
meanings.sent2: The robotries at the university focus on programming and design.
meanings.sent3: The robotries class had a fun project where students built mini robots.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to robotries was like a never-ending journey into the future.
meanings.sent5: The robotries lab buzzed with excitement as new robotic inventions were tested.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors of robots.
meanings.sent1: The robotries in the movie were so realistic, it felt like they were real.
meanings.sent2: During the competition, the robotries of each team were put to the test.
meanings.sent3: The robotries at the factory were so efficient, they finished the work in record time.
meanings.sent4: The precision of the robotries was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The robotries on display amazed the audience with their lifelike movements.
